title: WTB T206 HOF'ers with Big Borders - raw or opined on.
author: Leon

posts.post_title: WTB T206 HOF'ers with Big Borders - raw or opined on.
posts.post_content:
Generally looking for well centered with the full name showing at bottom. (I can be picky, can't I?)

Here is the short list I already have- 

Bresnahan port
Clarke holding bat
Clarke portrait
Cobb Red
Duffy- batting
Griffith port
Jennings both hands
Marquard hands at thighs
Wallace port
Wheat port
Young Portrait
